DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect CBT MMI quality life relief psychological symptom patient common mental disorder problem attend primary health care centre .
DOC.brief_title: Transdiagnostic Group Treatments Patients With Common Mental Disorders Primary Health Care
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Clinical randomise non blind control trial . Setting : The study perform outpatient primary health care centre serve 36 000 inhabitant . Participants : Patients ( n=278 ) , age 18-65 year , common mental problem disorder refer study GPs 245 include study . Interventions : Participants randomise CAU one two group intervention addition CAU . These : ) group cognitive behavioural base therapy ( CBT ) administer psychologist week 12 week , b ) group multimodal intervention ( MMI ) base protocol comprise mix exist group intervention exercise borrow multiple technique therapeutic school administer assistant nurse brief training , include two session per week 6 week . Main outcome measure : Primary outcome measure Mental Component Summary score SF-36 . Secondary outcome measure perceive stress scale ( PSS ) Self-Rating Scale Affective Syndromes ( CPRS-S-A )
DOC.criteria: patient common mental disorder problem patient exclude : meet diagnostic criterion bipolar psychotic disorder severe personality disorder , judge risk commit suicidal act , undergone MMI earlier . The investigator pay consideration whether patient treat SSRI medication .
DOC.keyword: primary health care , common mental disorder ,
